overview.description: Andhra Pradesh, a state in southern India, is renowned for its rich cultural heritage, stunning coastline, and ancient temples. Formed on November 1, 1956, it is known for its vibrant festivals, delicious cuisine, and the scenic beauty of places like Visakhapatnam and Tirupati.

top_destinations.name: Visakhapatnam
top_destinations.description: A port city known for its beaches, hills, and the famous Kailasagiri Park.
top_destinations.travel_tips: Visit beaches early; enjoy local seafood.

top_destinations.name: Tirupati
top_destinations.description: Home to the sacred Tirumala Venkateswara Temple, a major pilgrimage site.
top_destinations.travel_tips: Book darshan in advance; wear comfortable clothing.

top_destinations.name: Araku Valley
top_destinations.description: A scenic hill station with coffee plantations and tribal culture.
top_destinations.travel_tips: Carry warm clothes; explore by train.

accommodation.name: The Park Visakhapatnam
accommodation.description: Luxurious stay with sea views in Visakhapatnam.

accommodation.name: Taj Tirupati
accommodation.description: Premium hotel near Tirumala Temple with modern amenities.

accommodation.name: Haritha Valley Resort
accommodation.description: Comfortable stay amidst Araku Valley's greenery.

culinary_delights.name: Dwaraka Hotel
culinary_delights.description: Famous for spicy Andhra meals and biryani.

culinary_delights.name: Bheemli Sea View
culinary_delights.description: Best spot for fresh seafood by the beach.

culinary_delights.name: Minerva Coffee Shop
culinary_delights.description: Known for authentic dosas and filter coffee.

culinary_delights.name: The Peacock
culinary_delights.description: Elegant dining with a variety of dishes.

culinary_delights.name: Narayana Sadan
culinary_delights.description: Pure veg meals near Tirupati Temple.

must_visit_spots.name: Tirumala Venkateswara Temple
must_visit_spots.description: One of the holiest Hindu shrines in India.
must_visit_spots.tip: Plan darshan early to avoid crowds.

must_visit_spots.name: Araku Tribal Museum
must_visit_spots.description: Showcases the rich tribal heritage of the region.
must_visit_spots.tip: Visit with a guide for better insight.

must_visit_spots.name: Borra Caves
must_visit_spots.description: Natural limestone caves with unique formations.
must_visit_spots.tip: Wear sturdy shoes and carry a torch.

must_visit_spots.name: Lambasingi
must_visit_spots.description: Known as the 'Kashmir of Andhra', a cool hill station.
must_visit_spots.tip: Best visited in winter for misty views.

must_visit_spots.name: Srisailam Temple
must_visit_spots.description: Ancient temple dedicated to Lord Shiva.

travel_essentials.how_to_reach: By road: Visakhapatnam is 650 km from Hyderabad (NH16, 12-14 hrs). By train: Regular services to major cities. By air: Visakhapatnam Airport (10 km from city).
travel_essentials.tips: Carry light clothing; respect temple customs.
